undergraduate.name: Mechanical Operation Laboratory
undergraduate.description: Provides chemical engineering students the opportunity to observe, analyze and apply their engineering knowledge and training to the operation of equipment and processes commonly found in many chemical industries.

library.name: Departmental Library
library.description: In addition to the Central Library of the institute, the departmental library has a broad and eclectic collection of books and research articles covering different aspects of chemical engineering to assist students in enriching their knowledge and ideas.
library.collection: Several textbooks, reference books, and research articles available in both hard and soft copies.
